text: If you need help finding a water leak, please do yourself a favor and call Total Leak Detection. You will not regret it! I‚Äôm so impressed by how fast Andres and Victor found our ‚Äúmysterious‚Äù leak. It was difficult and impossible for others find, but they made it seem easy since they found it within a few hours. Not to mention they are super nice and respectful. Don‚Äôt waste time or money and go straight to the best!

text: my experience with the total leak detection company was very good they are professional and very kind I recommend them as the best 100% safe leak company

text: Hector came out to my property right away, and performed all the tests necessary to help me. He was very informative and helpful, and even helped me with the price. I really appreciate his help, and totally recommend this company.

text: Luis was amazing quick efficient and on time. He also helped with some other issues he saw that could create future problems for me. It is always refreshing to have knowledgeable pleasant, reliable and professional craftsman know their trade. I highly recommend you utilize Total Leak when you have problems.

text: Luis and Richard were awesome and extremely helpful in helping me evaluate a potential mold problem at my house. Hugely professional. Arrived right on time. I highly recommend working with total leak detection.
name: Gabrielle Shirek

text: Mike and Andres from Total Leak Detection amd Steven from Total Care were awesome. They arrived on time and were very clear about the process and my options. They worked quickly and discussed their honest opinion of the situation until we came to agree on the root cause of the issue. From there, they were able to recommend plumbing and restoration contractors who they frequently work with to handle the repairs. Would definitely recommend them as it is not easy to find reliable and honest contractors like them in Miami.
name: Kristi Creates

text: When I had a large water bill I contacted Total Leak to find out why.  Victor Mejia and Luis Perez were sent.  From the moment they got here I was pleased.  They were very polite and professional.  They answered every question I had and did a thorough inspection.  I would highly recommend this company to any one that needs their service.   I will definitely use them for any future needs.
name: James Davis

text: Mike and Andres were the technicians that arrived at my house. Both were wearing masks on arrival. They explained what they wanted to do, and provided the 3 options, with 3 different prices. After selecting the option that I wanted, which was ONLY the Leak Detection, they explained what they would be doing, and got my approval for each step of the way. They were courteous and professional. They cleaned up nicely after they were done. I am awaiting the written report with photos, their conclusions, and suggestions to remediate the problem. If it reflects what they told me during the process, I will be very happy that I used their Company. All-in-all, they were terrific and I would have no hesitation in recommending those 2 guys for any nagging leak detection job that is needed. Well done, Mike and Andres!
name: Les Herz

text: Andres and his colleague did excellent work identifying my leak - huge weight off of my shoulders. They were very professional and found the leak quickly. Would highly recommend. Particularly given the amount of hard work involved, the price was very reasonable. Thx again!
name: d danta

text: Checked whole house for mold and air quality. Luis was very efficient, knowledgeable and courteous and I would highly recommend this company to anyone needing this service. Luis was awesome and truly cares about his job and his clients too!!!
name: Marlene House

text: I used this company to help locate a leak in my home. The 2 gentlemen Victor and Mike were very detailed about what was needed to locate the leak. They were very professional and thorough in their actions and even offered some suggestions to prevent the leaking until I was able to get someone to repair the leaks. Talk about going above and beyond for the customer. I was very satisfied with the service and if needed I would definitely use them again. Thanks for your great customer service.
name: Tee Fulton

text: Mike and Victor were super knowledgeable and helped us find the leak in our roof that was causing water damage in our home. Thanks to them, we were able to not only detect the leak but also simulate causes to identify the source. They were friendly, efficient and very professional technicians! Highly recommend :)
name: Daniella Rondon

text: Victor and Greg were phenomenal! They were on time, knowledgeable,  informative and patient and they worked tirelessly to figure out the cause of my leak. It turns out my situation is rather unique so it took a lot of work and we're still not quite sure if the cause has been fully diagnosed but this is to no fault of theirs. They are very professional and use high tech equipment and techniques.  They were also willing to be more invasive upon request and asked for permission before cutting into any dry wall or pulling away baseboards. I would highly recommend this company for your leak detection needs.
name: Mir Spin

text: The technicians Victor and Andres came to my house. I showed them where the problem was they found a slow leak in my guest bathroom in less then 15 minutes. I would definitely refer this company to family and friends. The technicians were very helpful and professional.

text: We are truly satisfied with the work preformed by the 2 gentlemen who came to our house. They were punctual, knowledgeable and very professional. They were able to detect the source of our leak and also fix it right away. We highly recommend this company!!

text: We have had an ongoing issue with a leak in our kitchen for years! We would get it ‚Äúfixed‚Äù and then months down the line it would begin leaking .. we had a roofing company come out and say the leak was from the stucco, then a stucco company come out and say it wasn‚Äôt the stucco it was the gutter, gutter company said the gutters were fine.. and so on.. it was a night mare so we FINALLY had total leak detection come out so we could pinpoint the source of the leak once and for all! I wish we would have hired them from the beginning! The 2 men that came out were extremely polite and professional- they also were able to detect the leak quick and efficiently!!! Now we know where the water is coming in we can hire someone to fix the problem and be done with this mess once and for all!! Thank you total leak detection! I am super happy with the services that were provided!
name: Ashley Peterson

text:
After getting high water bills, we knew, we had a leak.
Unfortunately, there were no signs of water or humidity anywhere; so we did not know where the leak was.
Mike came with his specialized tools: humidity reader, camera, sound sensor, etc.
He was excellent in pinpointing where the leak was.
With his equipment he was able to tell that the leak was underneath the guest bathroom; he also pinpointed the exact pipe that had the problem.
Total Leak arranged to come the next day with their recommended plumber.
name: Al Loschak
